title: The Timid Count’s Daughter Doesn’t Wish for Quarrel - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Comedic Undertone   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Romantic Subplot   Tsundere
author: Shironeko   白猫
description:
I, Amelia, a plain follower of a Marquis’s daughter, Miss Sophie, only respected and admired her.

But when I saw her fiance, His Highness the Crown Prince, and a baron’s daughter secretly meeting each other at the same time as Miss Sophie, my unassuming, ordinary days of very much loving just peace and love stories began to change.

Furthermore, meeting the second prince and Miss Sophie’s younger brother, and also seeing how Miss Sophie was changing for good, I gradually began to think to myself that staying the way I am isn’t good for me.

This is a story of where the plain me who had been quietly living life begins to face forward, finding myself.>
